EmailTemplate.name: HwTrng_Responsemail
EmailTemplate.subject: Special training request submitted online - {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customer:<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Training Solutions. We have received your training request and will review your inquiry to determine how we can support your needs.
You will receive a response to your request within 3 days, during which time we may ask you further questions about your training requirements to ensure that we provide you with the best training options available. We appreciate your business and we look forward to providing a training solution that meets your needs.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us directly at 602-365-2833.
Best Regards,
Honeywell â€“ CAE Training Alliance
